Name: df.sort_values()
Usage: Sort the data frame on a specific column
Comments: Can sort with multiple columns, either ascending or descending

Name: df.columns
Comments: Can also set column names  by assign a list of column names

Name: df.dtypes
Usage: Display data types of the columns

Name: df.shape
Usage: Display the shape of the data frame

Name: df.describe()
Usage: Show basic stats of each column
Comments: Will show different stats for different types of column (numerical, datetime and etc.)

Name: s.value_counts()
Comments: Use df['...'] to get a column of data frame as series
